revised_title: The Influence of Environment on Growth and Development
tldr: This review lecture discusses the determinants of growth and form in animals, focusing on the importance of environment and nutrition. The author highlights the effects of various environmental factors, such as temperature, altitude, and nutrition, on growth and development. The lecture also explores the concept of biological age and its role in determining an animal's growth and function.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Growth and Development
